casebody.data:
CHEMICAL BANK NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY, Mary W. Fox and Lucy T. Wormhoudt, Co-executors of the Estate of Odell D. Tompkins, Deceased, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. UNITED STATES of America, Defendant-Appellee. No. 204, Docket 31449. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Dec. 5, 1967. Decided Dec. 6, 1967. *996Robert A. Klipstein, Bernays & Eisner, New York City, for plaintiffs-appellants. Samuel M. Eisenstat, Irwin B. Robins, Asst. U. S. Attys., Robert M. Morgen-thau, U. S. Atty., for defendant-appellee.

Before WATERMAN, MOORE and FRIENDLY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The judgment below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Mansfield reported in 275 F.Supp. 26 (S.D.N.Y.1967).
